page.title: 20RELIGIONS
page.content:
At Christmas time the Baptists provide a gift and toy service to needy children where required.
Old Buckenham Church of England church is part of the Quidenham group of parishes. These include Banham, Kenninghall, New Buckenham, Eccles and Wilby. Two vicars cover the group and on one Sunday of the month there is a group service in one parish. There are three family services a month and early communion.
The two vicars take Holy Communion to the old and ill and carry out home visits at times of need.
There is also a transcendental meditation centre in the village.
